mapper.select: SELECT p.id, text, start_date, duration, parent, progress, open1, contents, createdAt, DISPLAY_ORDER ,m.no owner_id, m.NAME ownerName, STATUS_NO, s.STATUSNAME , s.BACKGROUND color, priority FROM PROJECT p, MEMBER06 m , STATUS s WHERE 1=1 AND m.NO(+) = p.OWNER_ID AND s.NO = p.STATUS_NO ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER ASC

SELECT p.id, text, start_date, duration, end_date,parent, progress, open1, priority, contents, createdAt, DISPLAY_ORDER ,m.no owner_id, m.NAME ownerName, STATUS_NO, s.STATUSNAME , s.BACKGROUND color, pr.pname, pr.pcolor FROM PROJECT p, MEMBER06 m , STATUS s, priority pr WHERE 1=1 AND m.NO(+) = p.OWNER_ID AND s.NO = p.STATUS_NO AND parent = 0 AND pr.pno = p.priority ORDER BY createdAt DESC

SELECT p.id, text, start_date, duration, end_date,parent, progress, open1, priority, contents, createdAt, DISPLAY_ORDER ,m.no owner_id, m.NAME ownerName, STATUS_NO, s.STATUSNAME , s.BACKGROUND color, pr.pcolor FROM PROJECT p, MEMBER06 m , STATUS s, priority pr WHERE 1=1 AND m.NO(+) = p.OWNER_ID AND s.NO = p.STATUS_NO AND parent = 0 and p.id=#{id} and pr.pno = p.priority ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.update: update project set text = #{text}, owner_id = #{owner_id}, status_no = #{status_no}, start_date = #{start_date}, duration = #{duration}, end_date = #{end_date}, contents = #{contents}, priority = #{priority} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, text, start_date, duration, end_date, parent, progress, open1, contents, createdAt, DISPLAY_ORDER ,m.no owner_id, m.NAME ownerName, STATUS_NO, s.STATUSNAME , s.BACKGROUND color, priority FROM PROJECT p, MEMBER06 m , STATUS s WHERE 1=1 AND m.NO(+) = p.OWNER_ID AND s.NO = p.STATUS_NO START WITH p.id = #{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR p.id = p.PARENT ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
mapper.insert: insert into project(id, owner_id, status_no, text, start_date, duration, end_date, parent, priority,progress, open1, contents, createdAt) values (project_seq.nextval, #{owner_id}, #{status_no},#{text}, #{start_date}, #{duration}, #{end_date}, 0, #{priority} ,0, 1, #{contents}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update project set text = #{text}, owner_id = #{owner_id}, status_no = #{status_no}, start_date = #{start_date}, duration = #{duration}, end_date = #{end_date}, parent = #{parent}, contents = #{contents}, progress = #{progress}, open1 = #{open}, priority = #{priority}, display_order = #{display_order} where id = #{id}
update ownSchedule set title = #{title}, start1 = #{start}, end1 = #{end}, content = #{content}, backgroundColor = #{backgroundColor}, textColor = #{textColor}, allDay = #{allDay} where id = #{id}
